content: Just landed in NYC after Japan. Tried using chopsticks at a sushi place here, ended up in a chopstick duel with my miso soup. Japan made me appreciate authenticity, but also forks.
raw_content: "Just touched down in NYC after my Japanese adventure. Tried to use chopsticks at a sushi place here... ended up in a chopstick battle with my miso soup. Japan left me with a taste for authenticity but also a newfound appreciation for forks. #NYC #CulturalShock"
